Internal vertex properties

The following property maps are used together with a mix of user-defined and boost predefined vertex properties.



typedef boost::property_map
< GraphType, vertex_color_t >
::type 		VertexColorMap
 Vertex color. (needed for s-t maxflow routine).
typedef boost::property_map
< GraphType, potential_t >
::type 		VertexPotentialMap
 Vertex potential.
typedef boost::property_map
< GraphType,
previous_potential_t >::type 		VertexPreviousPotentialMap
 Previous vertex potential.
typedef boost::property_map
< GraphType,
boost::vertex_index_t >::type 		VertexIndexMap
 Vertex index. Can only be used with vecS selected as vertex storage.

Detailed Description

Defines the vertex properties.
